revision.text:
{{warning|Despite being exported to ZScript, this function is NOT designed to be callable directly on a {{struct|SecPlane}} pointer. Starting GZDoom 4.12.2 it's not possible to call it on a SecPlane at all.
If you need to move the floor/ceiling of a sector from ZScript, call '''[[MoveFloor]]''' or '''[[MoveCeiling]]''' on a {{struct|Sector}} pointer instead.}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]''' native void '''ChangeHeight'''(double ''hdiff'') ==Usage== Changes the SecPlane's distance from the world origin vertically by the given amount. ===Parameters=== *''hdiff'' - The value to shift by. Positive values shift up while negative values shift down. [[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:SecPlane]]
